title: Power and Powerlessness
img_alt: Exhibition catalogue Power and Powerlessness, Regensburg
unterschrift: Catalogue for exhibition Power and Powerlessness, project office Regensburg 2010
intro_text: A booklet entitled "Seiji Kimoto, Power and Powerlessness, People - Traces - Shadows" with texts by Dr. Friedrich Fuchs and Prof. Christoph Stölzl and a foreword by Bishop Dr. Gerhard Ludwig Müller was published in 2004 as a companion to an exhibition of the same name by Seiji Kimoto promoting the city's campaign to become European Capital of Culture in the year 2010. The catalog was supported by the Association of Fine Artists Lower Bavaria / Upper Palatinate, the Government of the Upper Palatinate and the Japanese Consulate General in Munich.
